lead_paragraph: The Sharks had just blown a three-goal lead in a potential series-clinching playoff game. Staples Center rocked with the combined power of the Kings' rally and the looming specters of San Jose's postseason failures.

headline.print_headline: Sharks Blow 3-Goal Lead, but Rally to Eliminate Kings 6-3
headline.main: Sharks Blow 3-Goal Lead, but Rally to Eliminate Kings 6-3
